data.title: Ljungby Weather in February: Temperature, Rainfall, & More
data.meta_description: Check accurate weather in February in Ljungby. Expect Ljungby February temperature around 3°C (37°F). Read clothing tips & recommended activities.
data.text:
Ljungby weather in February (Kronoberg, Sweden)

What weather conditions can you expect in Ljungby this February? Our guide gives you the essential weather details for this month.

Temperatures

Typically, February in Ljungby includes low temperatures and moderate snow/rainfall. Enjoy the winter season during this month. During the day, temperatures usually reach up to 3°C. At night, they tend to fall to approximately -4°C. Known for its cold temperatures, this month requires warm clothing. Ensure you dress appropriately to stay comfortable.

Precipitation

Ljungby in February usually receives moderate snow/rainfall, averaging around 59 mm for the month. This month experiences about 14 days of snow/rain according to historical data.

If you're looking for dry conditions and comfortable temperatures, February may not be the ideal month to visit Ljungby. June and August typically offer the most agreeable circumstances. On the other hand, January, February, March, November and December tend to be characterized by conditions that may not be as optimal.

For an in-depth look at the yearly conditions, visit our specialized Ljungby climate page with graphs.

Ljungby, monthly averages in February

Min Temperature -4°C

Max Temperature 3°C

Chance of Rain 45%

Precipitation 59 mm

Rainy days 14 days

Where to go in Sweden in February

Find out more about the weather in Sweden and which places have the best travel conditions in this month.

Map not visible? Whoops sorry! Please refresh the page.

Legend perfect weather pleasant tolerable unpleasant poor

Perfect weather is subjective. On this map perfect weather has been defined with temperatures between 20°C and 29°C and not too much precipitation (less than 90 mm a month).

So, what should you wear in this month?

Wear a base layer in cold weather; this is the #1 thing you can do to increase your overall body temperature.

What To Do

We rated the following activities from 1 (least suitable) to 10 (best) to do.

Cycling 3/10

Walking 3/10

Barbeque 1/10

Camping 1/10

Outdoor sports 3/10

Interested in more climate information?

This site provides you with all the information you need about the climate in Ljungby.

Our site offers climate and forecast data for every country in the world. Are you going to Sweden? On this website you can find historical weather averages for many cities in Sweden. Not sure yet where to go? We now have a tool which recommends destinations that suit your ideal travel conditions. Find out where to go with our weather planner.
